variables.input:
fetch events
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name) 
| summarize count(), by: k8s.namespace.name

fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
| fieldsAdd managementZones
| filter matchesValue(managementZones, "[demo")
| fields containerNames

fetch spans
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| filter not contains(db.namespace, "<unavailable>")
| summarize count(), by: {db.namespace}
| fields db.namespace

fetch dt.entity.service
| fields id, name = entity.name
| filter isNotNull(name) and name != "<default>"
| sort name asc

0.title: Log Error para analise
0.query:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
  and k8s.container.name == $container
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "error")
| sort timestamp desc

9.title: CPU

10.title: Memory

22.title: Top 5 request (media)
22.query:
fetch spans
| filter dt.kubernetes.workload.name == $container
  AND dt.host_group.id == $Cluster
| sort start_time desc
| summarize avg_latency = avg(duration), by: {url.path}
|limit 10

23.title: Status 4xx
23.query:
fetch spans
| filter dt.kubernetes.workload.name ~ $container
AND dt.host_group.id == $Cluster
AND http.response.status_code >= 400
| fields url.path, http.request.method, duration, http.response.status_code
| summarize total = count()

24.title: Status 5xx
24.query:
fetch spans
| filter dt.kubernetes.workload.name ~ $container
AND dt.host_group.id == "hostdemo"
AND http.response.status_code >= 500
| fields url.path, http.request.method, duration, http.response.status_code
| summarize total = count()

30.title: PODS Ativos
30.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| fields entity.name, cloudApplicationInstancePhase
| filter cloudApplicationInstancePhase == "RUNNING"
  and contains(entity.name, $container)
| summarize activePods = count()

31.title: Pod restart - falha ao subir
31.query:
fetch events
| filter k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
  and k8s.workload.name == $container
  and dt.kubernetes.event.reason == "Unhealthy"
  and contains(dt.kubernetes.event.message, "connection refused")
| summarize count(), by: {k8s.pod.name}

32.title: Pod restart - auto
32.query:
fetch events
| filter k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
  and k8s.workload.name == $container
  and dt.kubernetes.event.reason == "Killing"
  and contains(dt.kubernetes.event.message, "will be restarted")
| summarize count()

33.title: PODS Inativos
33.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| fields entity.name, cloudApplicationInstancePhase
| filter cloudApplicationInstancePhase == "FAILED"
  and contains(entity.name, $container)
| summarize activePods = count()

38.title: Log Error para analise
38.query:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.namespace.name == $Namespace
  and k8s.container.name == $container
| filter matchesPhrase(content, "error")
| summarize count()

41.title: Total executado
41.query:
fetch spans
| filter in(db.namespace, $database)
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| fieldsAdd query = db.query.text
| makeTimeseries total = count(), by: { query }, interval: 5m

42.title: TOP 10
42.query:
fetch spans
| filter in(db.namespace, $database)
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| fieldsAdd response_time = duration, cpu = span.timing.cpu, query = db.query.text
| summarize total = count(), avg_response_time = avg(response_time), avg_cpu = avg(cpu), by: { query }
| sort total desc
| limit 10

48.title: Total de erro nas querys
48.query:
fetch spans, scanLimitGBytes: 50, samplingRatio: 10
| filter dt.entity.service == $Service
| filter span.kind == "client" and isNotNull(db.system)
| fieldsAdd db.query.text = coalesce(db.query.text, db.statement)
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| filterOut in(db.operation.name, {"PREPARE", "DESCRIBE"}) 
  or startsWith(db.query.text, "PREPARE", caseSensitive: false) 
  or startsWith(db.query.text, "DESCRIBE", caseSensitive: false)
| fieldsAdd samplingProbability = (power(2, 56) - coalesce(sampling.threshold, 0)) * power(2, -56)
| fieldsAdd samplingMultiplicity = coalesce(1/samplingProbability, 1)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(span.status_code == "error" or isNotNull(error.type) or iAny(span.events[][span_event.name]=="exception"), samplingMultiplicity, else: 0)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(aggregation.exception_count > 0, failed * aggregation.exception_count, else: failed)
| summarize totalErrors = sum(coalesce(failed, 0))
| fieldsAdd totalErrors = coalesce(totalErrors, 0)

50.title: Total de querys
50.query:
fetch spans
| filter entityName(dt.entity.service)  == $Service

| filter span.kind == "client" and isNotNull(db.system)
| fieldsAdd db.query.text = coalesce(db.query.text, db.statement)
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| filterOut in (db.operation.name, { "PREPARE", "DESCRIBE" })
  or startsWith(db.query.text, {"PREPARE"}, caseSensitive: false)
  or startsWith(db.query.text, {"DESCRIBE"}, caseSensitive: false)
| fieldsAdd samplingProbability = (power(2, 56) - coalesce(sampling.threshold, 0)) * power(2, -56)
| fieldsAdd samplingMultiplicity = coalesce(1/samplingProbability, 1)
| fieldsAdd aggregationMultiplicity = coalesce(aggregation.count, 1)
| fieldsAdd aggregationDuration = coalesce(aggregation.duration_sum, duration)
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(span.status_code == "error" or isNotNull(error.type) or iAny(span.events[][span_event.name]=="exception"), samplingMultiplicity, else: 0)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(aggregation.exception_count > 0, failed * aggregation.exception_count, else: failed)

| summarize {
  queryCount = sum(samplingMultiplicity * aggregationMultiplicity),
  errorCount = sum(failed),
  cumulativeDuration = sum(samplingMultiplicity * aggregationDuration)
}, by: { dt.entity.service.name, dt.entity.service, db.system, db.query.text, db.namespace }


| fieldsAdd lifetime = entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "lifetime", type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd customIconPath = entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "customIconPath", type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd icon = entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "icon", type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd entity = record(entityId = dt.entity.service,
        displayName = entityName(dt.entity.service),
        lifetimeEndMillis= unixMillisFromTimestamp(lifetime[end]),
        customIconPath = customIconPath,
        icon = icon[primaryIconType])

| fields
  entity,
  queryCount = toLong(queryCount),
  errorCount = toLong(errorCount),
  dt.entity.service.name,
  dt.entity.service,
  db.system,
  db.query.text,
  db.namespace,
  id = toUid(hashMd5(concat(dt.entity.service.name, dt.entity.service, db.system, db.query.text, db.namespace))),
  queryDuration = cumulativeDuration / queryCount,
  cumulativeDuration

| sort isNull(cumulativeDuration) asc, cumulativeDuration desc

| fields id, db.query.text, errorCount
|summarize count(), by:{errorCount}

51.title: DB Queries - Duração Acima de 17ms
51.query:
fetch spans, scanLimitGBytes: 50, samplingRatio: 10
| filter contains(entityName(dt.entity.service), $Service)
| filter span.kind == "client" and isNotNull(db.system)
| fieldsAdd db.query.text = coalesce(db.query.text, db.statement)
| filter isNotNull(db.query.text)
| filterOut in(db.operation.name, {"PREPARE", "DESCRIBE"}) 
  or startsWith(db.query.text, "PREPARE", caseSensitive: false) 
  or startsWith(db.query.text, "DESCRIBE", caseSensitive: false)
| fieldsAdd samplingProbability = (power(2, 56) - coalesce(sampling.threshold, 0)) * power(2, -56)
| fieldsAdd samplingMultiplicity = coalesce(1/samplingProbability, 1)
| fieldsAdd aggregationMultiplicity = coalesce(aggregation.count, 1)
| fieldsAdd aggregationDuration = coalesce(aggregation.duration_sum, duration)
| fieldsAdd serviceName = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(span.status_code == "error" or isNotNull(error.type) or iAny(span.events[][span_event.name]=="exception"), samplingMultiplicity, else: 0)
| fieldsAdd failed = if(aggregation.exception_count > 0, failed * aggregation.exception_count, else: failed)
| summarize {
  queryCount = sum(samplingMultiplicity * aggregationMultiplicity),
  errorCount = sum(failed),
  cumulativeDuration = sum(samplingMultiplicity * aggregationDuration)
}, by: { serviceName, dt.entity.service, db.system, db.query.text, db.namespace }
| fields db.query.text, errorCount, queryCount, queryDuration = cumulativeDuration / queryCount, cumulativeDuration
| filter queryDuration > 17000000ns
| sort queryDuration desc
| limit 5

52.title: Throughput do banco login
52.query:
// Metric microchart simple lookup query
      timeseries failureCount_timeseries = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, rate: 1m), by:{dt.entity.service} , bins: 60,filter: entityName(dt.entity.service) == $Service , nonempty: true  
| fieldsAdd metricName = "Failed requests"
| append[// Metric microchart calculation lookup query
      timeseries {
        operand1 = sum(dt.service.request.count, rate: 1m),
        operand2 = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, rate: 1m)
      }, by: { dt.entity.service }, bins: 60, filter: entityName(dt.entity.service) == $Service , nonempty: true 
      
| fieldsAdd successfulRequests_timeseries = operand1[] - operand2[] 
      
| fieldsRemove operand1, operand2 
| fieldsAdd metricName = "Successful requests"]

57.title: Broker - Requisições de Produção com Falha

59.title: Kafka Broker - Messages in rate

60.title: Kafka Broker - Produce request rate

61.title: consumo lag
61.query:
timeseries { avg(`kafka.consumer.consumer-metrics.records-lag`), value.A = avg(`kafka.consumer.consumer-metrics.records-lag`, scalar: true) },
by: { host.name }

65.title: Tempo disponivel ip-xxxxx

66.title: Memory usage %  ip-xxxx
66.query:
timeseries { avg(dt.host.memory.usage), value.A = avg(dt.host.memory.usage, scalar: true) },
filter: { matchesValue(entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name"), "ip-xxx.sa-east-1.compute.internal") }

67.title: Problem  ip-xxx
67.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter matchesValue(host.name, "ip-xxx.sa-east-1.compute.internal")
| summarize count()

68.title: Events kafka ip-xxxx
68.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.entity.host.name == "ip-xxx.sa-east-1.compute.internal" and  contains(event.description, "kafka")
| fields  event.description
|summarize count()

70.query:
timeseries { avg(dt.host.memory.usage), value.A = avg(dt.host.memory.usage, scalar: true) },
filter: { matchesValue(entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name"), "ip-xxxxx.sa-east-1.compute.internal") }

71.title: Disk ip-xxxx
71.query:
timeseries { avg(dt.host.disk.free), value.A = avg(dt.host.disk.free, scalar: true) }, by: { dt.entity.disk }, filter: { matchesValue(entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name"), "ip-xxxx.sa-east-1.compute.internal") }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.disk.name = entityName(dt.entity.disk)
